ComicInfo.Title: March of the Wooden Soldiers, Chapter Eight: In Like a Lion - Out on the Lam
ComicInfo.Summary: March of the Wooden Soldiers, Chapter Eight: In Like a Lion - Out on the Lam: Red Riding Hood's final stand. In the end, so many brave souls to say goodbye to. As things are cleaned up, trouble seems to be brewing in the Mundy world. And someone's water just broke...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-05 16:51:02. [CVDB96127] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 21:29:36. [Issue ID 213146]
